demo_repo.counter module¶

class demo_repo.counter.Counter¶

Bases: object

Simple counter for demonstrating tests.

Returns the count.

Increments the count.

demo_repo.service module¶

class demo_repo.service.Service¶

Bases: object

Simple service that uses the Counter class.

Failing service call.

Returns number of calls for two services.

First dummy service call for demo purposes.
